    This controller class is the main controller of the framework which initializes all model objects and
    GameControllerTest  
    gameScreenController  
    MainScreenController
    This class is the main controller class of the main screen
    MapEditController
    This is a controller class of the map edit functionality
    MapJsonParser
    This class implements map parsing functionality with simultaneously map validation functionality
    maptest  
    newGameController  
    offerScreenController
    This class handles different game playing operations such as Buying plots, building house, paying rent etc.
    SaveAndLoad
    This class implements functionality of saving the game and load the old game after exiting
    StrategyAttack
    This is the implementation of strategy interface where a player is aggresive Aggresive player will buy every plot he lands on and build house where he has property
    StrategyCheater
    This is the implementation of strategy interface where a player is Cheater Cheater player will not play according to the rules For Instance, He won't pay price, rent upon getting penalized
    StrategyConservative
    This is the implementation of strategy interface where a player is Conservative Conservative player will play defensively.
    StrategyRandom
    This is the implementation of strategy interface where a player is aggresive.
    tournamentController
    This is the main controller class of Tournament mode
    tournamentRController
    This class is a controller class of Tournament mode result box
  • Exception Summary

    InvalidMapException
    This class throws Invalid map Exception from MapJsonParser file
